mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie (managerCode, movieName,movieAudience,movieUpdate, movieSynopsis, moviePoster, moviePosterBG, movieImages, movieTime) VALUES ( ( SELECT managerCode FROM manager where managerId=#{manager.managerId}), #{movieName},0,NOW(), #{movieSynopsis}, #{moviePoster}, #{moviePosterBG}, #{movieImages},#{movieTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT movieName,movieName,moviePoster FROM movie WHERE managerCode = (SELECT managerCode FROM manager WHERE managerId = #{managerId})
